## NodeImage.removeAttribute() method

Unset the DOM width and height parameters.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
removeAttribute(attr: "width" | "height"): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  attr | <code>&quot;width&quot; &#124; &quot;height&quot;</code> | The name of the attribute to remove. "width" or "height". |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
